Name: Zoning, 281-311 Marcus Garvey Boulevard, Brooklyn (C 230146 ZMK)
Title: Application number C 230146 ZMK (281-311 Marcus Garvey Boulevard) submitted by Omni New York, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17a, changing from an R6A District to an R7A District, changing from an R6B District to an R7A District, and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 3, Council District 36.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
